    public class TwoLineVertexer
extends BaseSimpleVertexer
    Class to calculate the POCA between two straight lines

      • getPOCALineToLineAlt

        private Hep3Vector getPOCALineToLineAlt()
        Function to calculate DCA in 3D of two lines
        Parameters:
        A1 - Starting 3D space point for one of the straight lines
        A2 - End 3D space point for one of the straight lines
        B1 - Starting 3D space point for one of the straight lines
        B2 - End 3D space point for one of the straight lines
        Returns:
        position of closest approach of the two lines defined by the input parameters

      • getPOCALineToLine

        private Hep3Vector getPOCALineToLine()
        Function to calculate DCA in 3D of two lines
        Parameters:
        A1 - Starting 3D space point for one of the straight lines
        A2 - End 3D space point for one of the straight lines
        B1 - Starting 3D space point for one of the straight lines
        B2 - End 3D space point for one of the straight lines
        Returns:
        position of closest approach of the two lines defined by the input parameters
